meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - The Remastered Ruckus of Legend of Mana!

Folks, buckle up! We're diving into the whimsical world of Legend of Mana, a classic RPG that's left critics in awe and confusion alike! Since I'm not one to shy away from poking fun at myself (or others *cough* Digital Chumps), let's get this party started!

Apparently, Digital Chumps thinks this remastered beauty is "full of wonder and whimsy"! And who am I to disagree? With its stunning visuals and enchanting art direction, Legend of Mana is a treat for the eyes. But don't worry; our friends at RPG Site aren't just going gaga over the pretty pictures – they're also excited about the potential appeal to new generations!

Now, I know what you're thinking: "What about the combat system?" Well, multi-mystery-writer Multiplayer.it says it didn't age too well... but hey, that's what makes Legend of Mana a classic, right? It's unapologetically quirky, and I respect that. Jeuxvideo.com agrees; this game will always divide opinions.

But hold on to your pixelated hats, folks! Wccftech thinks Legend of Mana is an "experimental PS1-era title" that planted the seeds for future Square Enix RPGs – yep, it's an acquired taste!

As for CD-Action, well... let's just say they're not exactly thrilled with the conservative approach taken in this remastered version. They felt some of the game's biggest problems (ahem, poor combat system) were still present and would bother new players more than ever.

There you have it – critics' thoughts on Legend of Mana! What do I think? Well, I reckon this game is a true original, full of hidden gems just begging to be discovered. So, if you're ready for an adventure that might not always make sense but will leave you feeling wonder-struck... then grab your controller and join the faeries in Fa'Diel!

That's it, folks! What do you think about Legend of Mana? Share your thoughts below!
